offer_summary: Paycheck Assistance / 0% APR bridge loan for eligible members with qualifying federal pay direct deposit
who_qualifies: NFCU members with qualifying direct deposit; impacted by shutdown
notes: Enrollment typically opens at start of shutdown; terms may vary by event

offer_summary: Special shutdown relief loans and hardship assistance across products
notes: Programs may vary by event

offer_summary: Furlough relief options including deferrals/forbearance/repayment plans
notes: Terms vary; confirm on program page

offer_summary: Furlough Relief Line of Credit (e.g., up to $10,000; introductory 0% period; then fixed APR)
notes: Check current APR/deferral terms

institution_name: United States Senate Federal Credit Union (USSFCU)
offer_summary: Federal Shutdown Relief Loan (e.g., up to $5,000; payment deferral)
notes: Check current terms

offer_summary: Low-rate loans and payment deferrals for impacted members
notes: Justice FCU assistance

offer_summary: Emergency/short-term loans for federal employees; penalty-free CD withdrawals; payment flexibility
notes: Terms vary; confirm on page

offer_summary: Emergency relief loans up to $5,000 and payment extensions
notes: Local availability; terms vary

offer_summary: Member Relief Center: payment deferrals and emergency loans
notes: Options vary by account

offer_summary: Find credit unions offering skip-a-pay, fee waivers, and emergency loans during shutdowns
who_qualifies: All federal employees; membership may be required
notes: Use to locate local CUs

offer_summary: Hardship assistance across mortgages, credit cards, auto, and banking
notes: Call customer support for shutdown-specific help

offer_summary: Hardship assistance portal for mortgages, cards, auto, and banking
notes: Case-by-case assistance

offer_summary: Micro-grants and no-interest hardship loans for federal employees
notes: Fast, small-dollar support

offer_summary: Payment deferrals and assistance for impacted workers
notes: Ask for shutdown relief

offer_summary: Find your local food bank by ZIP/state
notes: Nationwide locator

offer_summary: Call 211 or search online for rent, utility, food, and local assistance programs
notes: Local referrals across all states

offer_summary: Operations continue; contributions/match may pause while in non-pay; loans/withdrawals follow normal rules
notes: Watch for temporary relief legislation

offer_summary: Coverage continues during a lapse; missed employee premiums collected after; FEGLI continues up to 12 months in non-pay
notes: See OPM shutdown guidance

offer_summary: Apply for unemployment benefits during furlough; benefits may need to be repaid if back pay is later issued
who_qualifies: Furloughed federal employees per state eligibility rules
notes: Add the state’s official UI portal once verified

offer_summary: Statewide referral to rent, utility, food, and local aid programs
notes: Use 211.org to locate county/city programs

offer_summary: Find local food banks and pantries by ZIP or city
notes: Use ZIP search to narrow to county/city
